raw_comment: I noticed that the graph collects data from two groups: 15-24 years old and 40+ years old people. I wonder why people in Mali and Brazil show low expectation. It's related to me because I'm in the range of 15-24 years old. In this graph, young people are more likely to say the world is getting better with each generation than old people.

One group consists of people who are 15-24 years old.
One group consists of people who are 40 or more years old.

People in Brazil show low expectation.
I wonder why people in Mali show low expectation.
